verses.verse: וֶאֱלִישָׁ֡ע <S%H477><s%> Elisha דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> Then spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִשָּׁה֩ <S%H802><s%> unto the woman אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> wheresoever הֶחֱיָ֨ה <S%H2421><s%> he had restored to life אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנָ֜הּ <S%H1121><s%> whose son לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying ק֤וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Arise וּלְכִי֙ <S%H1980><s%> and go [אַתִּי כ] (אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> you ק) וּבֵיתֵ֔ךְ <S%H1004><s%> thou and thine household וְג֖וּרִי <S%H1481><s%> and sojourn בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> wherever תָּג֑וּרִי <S%H1481><s%> thou canst sojourn כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> hath called יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD לָֽרָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> for a famine וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will even בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> and it shall also come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> arose הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman וַתַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and did כִּדְבַ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> after the saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וּבֵיתָ֔הּ <S%H1004><s%> with her household וַתָּ֥גָר <S%H1481><s%> and sojourned בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become מִקְצֵה֙ <S%H7097><s%> end שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> And it came to pass at the seven שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years' וַתָּ֥שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> that the woman מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַתֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> and she went forth לִצְעֹ֣ק <S%H6817><s%> to cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּיתָ֖הּ <S%H1004><s%> for her house וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and שָׂדָֽהּ׃ <S%H7704><s%> and for her land

וְהַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מְדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> talked אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with גֵּ֣חֲזִ֔י <S%H1522><s%> with Gehazi נַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> the servant אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying סַפְּרָה־ <S%H5608><s%> Tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִ֔י אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגְּדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> me I pray thee all the great things אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <S%H477><s%> that Elisha

וַ֠יְהִי <S%H1961><s%> become ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מְסַפֵּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> And it came to pass as he was telling לַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> how הֶחֱיָ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> to life אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֵּת֒ <S%H4191><s%> a dead body וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> that behold the woman אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose הֶחֱיָ֤ה <S%H2421><s%> he had restored to life אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנָהּ֙ <S%H1121><s%> whose son צֹעֶ֣קֶת <S%H6817><s%> cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בֵּיתָ֖הּ <S%H1004><s%> for her house וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and for שָׂדָ֑הּ <S%H7704><s%> and for her land וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said גֵּֽחֲזִי֙ <S%H1522><s%> And Gehazi אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> My lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> this [is] the woman וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> this בְּנָ֖הּ <S%H1121><s%> and this [is] her son אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הֶחֱיָ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> restored to life אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <S%H477><s%> whom Elisha

וַיִּשְׁאַ֥ל <S%H7592><s%> asked הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And when the king לָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> the woman וַתְּסַפֶּר־ <S%H5608><s%> she told ל֑וֹ וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> appointed לָ֣הּ הַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <S%H4428><s%> him So the king סָרִ֨יס <S%H5631><s%> officer אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> unto her a certain לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָשֵׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> Restore אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לָהּ֙ וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תְּבוּאֹ֣ת <S%H8393><s%> all that [was] hers and all the fruits הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field מִיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> since the day עָזְבָ֥ה <S%H5800><s%> that she left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עָֽתָּה׃ <S%H6258><s%> now פ

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came אֱלִישָׁע֙ <S%H477><s%> And Elisha דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> to Damascus וּבֶן־ הֲדַ֥ד <S%H1130><s%> and Benhadad מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria חֹלֶ֑ה <S%H2470><s%> was sick וַיֻּגַּד־ <S%H5046><s%> and it was told ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying בָּ֛א <S%H935><s%> is come אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> The man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> hither

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חֲזָהאֵ֗ל <S%H2371><s%> unto Hazael קַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> Take בְּיָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> a present וְלֵ֕ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go לִקְרַ֖את <S%H7125><s%> meet אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֨ <S%H1875><s%> and enquire אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> God מֵֽאוֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> by him saying הַאֶחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> Shall I recover מֵחֳלִ֥י <S%H2483><s%> disease זֶֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went חֲזָאֵל֮ <S%H2371><s%> So Hazael לִקְרָאתוֹ֒ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> him and took מִנְחָ֤ה <S%H4503><s%> a present בְיָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> with him וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every ט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> even of every good thing דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> burden אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty גָּמָ֑ל <S%H1581><s%> camels' וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and came וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said בִּנְךָ֨ <S%H1121><s%> Thy son בֶן־ הֲדַ֤ד <S%H1130><s%> Benhadad מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> of Syria שְׁלָחַ֤נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> me to thee saying הַאֶחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> Shall I recover מֵחֳלִ֥י <S%H2483><s%> disease זֶֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> then אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <S%H477><s%> And Elisha לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> say [לֹא כ] (לֹ֖ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) חָיֹ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> unto him Thou mayest certainly תִחְיֶ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> recover וְהִרְאַ֥נִי <S%H7200><s%> hath shewed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> howbeit the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> me that he shall surely יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> die

וַיַּעֲמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> And he settled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his countenance וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> stedfastly עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֑שׁ <S%H954><s%> until he was ashamed וַיֵּ֖בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> wept אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חֲזָאֵ֔ל <S%H2371><s%> And Hazael מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> my lord בֹכֶ֑ה <S%H1058><s%> Why weepeth וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because יָדַ֡עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Because I know אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you תַּעֲשֶׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> that thou wilt do לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> the evil מִבְצְרֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H4013><s%> their strong holds תְּשַׁלַּ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> wilt thou set בָּאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> on fire וּבַחֻֽרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H970><s%> and their young men בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword תַּהֲרֹ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> wilt thou slay וְעֹלְלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5768><s%> their children תְּרַטֵּ֔שׁ <S%H7376><s%> and wilt dash וְהָרֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2030><s%> their women with child תְּבַקֵּֽעַ׃ <S%H1234><s%> and rip up

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חֲזָהאֵ֔ל <S%H2371><s%> And Hazael כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> But מָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> what עַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> But what [is] thy servant הַכֶּ֔לֶב <S%H3611><s%> a dog כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> should יַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> that he should do הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> act הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> this great הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <S%H477><s%> Elisha הִרְאַ֧נִי <S%H7200><s%> hath shewed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> that מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> me that thou [shalt be] king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> over Syria

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> departed מֵאֵ֣ת אֱלִישָׁ֗ע <S%H477><s%> from Elisha וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> to his master וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> who said ל֔וֹ מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> to him What said לְךָ֖ אֱלִישָׁ֑ע <S%H477><s%> Elisha וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> to thee? And he answered אָ֥מַר <S%H559><s%> He told לִ֖י חָיֹ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> me [that] thou shouldest surely תִחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> recover

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <S%H4283><s%> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> that he took הַמַּכְבֵּר֙ <S%H4346><s%> a thick cloth וַיִּטְבֹּ֣ל <S%H2881><s%> and dipped בַּמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> [it] in water וַיִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <S%H6566><s%> and spread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> [it] on his face וַיָּמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> so that he died וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned חֲזָהאֵ֖ל <S%H2371><s%> and Hazael תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ
